method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _flush
method.comment: Ensures all cookies currently accessible through the getCookie API are written to persistent storage. Added in API level 21.

method.name: _getcookie
method.comment: Gets all the cookies for the given URL. Added in API level 1.

method.name: _hascookies
method.comment: Gets whether there are stored cookies. Added in API level 1.

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object. Pass Native B4A WebView to initialize new instance. Added in API level 1.

method.name: _removeallcookies
method.comment: Removes all cookies. Added in API level 1.

method.name: _removeexpiredcookie
method.comment: This method was deprecated in API level 21. The WebView handles removing expired cookies automatically. Added in API level 1.

method.name: _removesessioncookies
method.comment: Removes all session cookies, which are cookies without an expiration date. Added in API level 1.

method.name: _setacceptcookies
method.comment: Gets or sets whether the application's UltimateWebView instances send and accept cookies. Added in API level 1.

method.name: _setacceptfileschemecookies
method.comment: Gets or sets whether the application's UltimateWebView instances should send and accept cookies for file scheme URLs. This method was deprecated in API level 30. This setting is not secure. Added in API level 12

method.name: _setacceptthirdpartycookies
method.comment: Gets or sets whether the UltimateWebView should allow third party cookies to be set. Added in API level 21.

method.name: _setcookie
method.comment: Sets a single cookie (key-value pair) for the given URL. Added in API level 21.

property.name: _acceptcookies
property.comment: Gets or sets whether the application's UltimateWebView instances send and accept cookies. Added in API level 1.

property.name: _acceptfileschemecookies
property.comment: Gets or sets whether the application's UltimateWebView instances should send and accept cookies for file scheme URLs. This method was deprecated in API level 30. This setting is not secure. Added in API level 12

property.name: _acceptthirdpartycookies
property.comment: Gets or sets whether the UltimateWebView should allow third party cookies to be set. Added in API level 21.
